content: Countdown: Inspiration4 Mission to Space | Netflix Official Site
content2: From training to launch to landing, this all-access docuseries rides along with the Inspiration4 crew on the first all-civilian orbital space mission.

title1: Grimes seen reading Karl Marx following split with world's richest man Elon Musk
content: Grimes, who recently “semi-separated” from Elon Musk
content2: whose $200 billion makes him for now the world’s richest man — was spotted Friday in downtown Los Angeles flipping through Karl Marx’s decidedly anti-capitalistic “Communist Manifesto” in her first public appearance since the split.
